title: Michael Becomes Jim - The Office US
author: The Office
description:
After Jim shares his secret with him, Michael explores their new best friendship.

From Season 2, Episode 13 "The Secret" - Jim tries to make sure that nobody in the office finds out about his crush on Pam, but the problem is he's already told Michael. This leads to a trip to Hooters for some damage control.

Streaming now on Peacock: https://www.peacocktv.com/stream-tv/the-office?cid=2101priolibraryofceownyt653&utm_campaign=2101priolibraryofce&utm_source=yt&utm_medium=own_yt_brandawareness_descriptionlink&utm_content=theofficeprelau&utm_term=peacock

Watch The Office US on Google Play: http://bit.ly/2xYQkLD & iTunes http://apple.co/2eW0rcK

Subscribe: http://bit.ly/2y5VK8N

This is the official YouTube channel for The Office US. Home to all of the official clips from the series, the funniest moments, pranks and fails. 
Think we should feature your favourite episode? Let us know in the comments! 

FB : https://www.facebook.com/theofficenbc
Twitter : https://twitter.com/theofficenbc
Website : http://www.nbc.com/the-office

#TheOffice #USA #nbc

localize.description:
在Jim与他分享自己的秘密后，Michael探索了他们新的最好的友谊。

从第二季第13集 "秘密"--吉姆试图确保办公室里没有人发现他对帕姆的暗恋，但问题是他已经告诉了迈克尔。这导致了他去Hooters餐厅进行一些损害控制。

现在流在孔雀：https://www.peacocktv.com/stream-tv/the-office?cid=2101priolibraryofceownyt653&utm_campaign=2101priolibraryofce&utm_source=yt&utm_medium=own_yt_brandawareness_descriptionlink&utm_content=theofficeprelau&utm_term=peacock

localize.description:
在Jim與他分享自己的祕密後，Michael探索了他們新的最好的友誼。

從第二季第13集 "祕密"--吉姆試圖確保辦公室裏沒有人發現他對帕姆的暗戀，但問題是他已經告訴了邁克爾。這導致了他去Hooters餐廳進行一些損害控制。

現在流在孔雀：https://www.peacocktv.com/stream-tv/the-office?cid=2101priolibraryofceownyt653&utm_campaign=2101priolibraryofce&utm_source=yt&utm_medium=own_yt_brandawareness_descriptionlink&utm_content=theofficeprelau&utm_term=peacock
